name: abcwallet-extension-provider-api
description: ABC Wallet injects a global API into website visited by its users at `window.abc`. This API complies [EIP-1193](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1193), Ethereum Javascript provider API. We recommend using `@abcwallet/abc-provider` to detect our provider on any platform or browser.
author: abcwallet
